keyPolicies.policyDescription: Dr. Stephen Martin is an expert in Environmental Education and works on sustainability changes for major companies. He supports green technologies, helping the economy and more help for pensioners with escalating living costs.
Believes in the potential of Nick Clegg's commitment to Green Investment to make a significant impact on the local economy and environment.
Thinks that Carbon Capture and Storage Technology could help reduce the impact of declining coal mining.

issues.environment: Expert in Environmental Education and works with sustainability changes for companies like BP and Tesco. Supports green technologies.
issues.socialWelfare: Support for more help for pensioners facing rising living costs.

leaflet.personalStatement: A longstanding Liberal Democrat, has served as a councillor and Parliamentary candidate.

contactInformation.address: 10 Ash Grove, Ash Green, Coventry, Warwickshire CV7 9AT

images.caption: Nick Clegg, Stephen Martin and the Liberal Democrats are heading for shock victories in this election.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Dr. Stephen Martin grows his own food and micro-generates his own electricity, advocating for self-sufficiency and environmental responsibility.
